name: Air Gun
effect: Gadget Difficulty:6 Weapon. This dude does not become Wanted for calling out a dude in a private location.

name: Becky Henrick
effect: Shootout: Boot Becky to banish any one Harrowed dude from this location. The Harrowed dude's controller must move the dude to another location he or she controls. Noon:Boot Becky and pay 2 ghost rock to control any Harrowed dude in the same location. Return control of the dude after nightfall.

name: Buffalo Rifle
effect: Weapon. If this dude is adjacent to a location where a job or Shootout is taking place, he may join the posse without moving or booting, and may join even if booted.

name: Bum Rush
effect: Shootout: One of your dudes in this Shootout gets a +1 Bullet bonus for this Shootout. Only one Bum Rush can be played per Shootout.

name: Burn 'Em Down
effect: Shootout: Boot one of your dudes in this Shootout to reduce the Bullet Rating of one opposing dude in this gunfight by a number of Bullets equal to your dude`s Bullet Rating.

name: Buster Madison
effect: Huckster:0 Noon: Boot Buster at a saloon to produce 1 ghost rock.

name: Captain Sim Yut-San
effect: Reaction: Immediately after you move Captain Sim, move any of your other Maze Rats from the location Sim started his move to his present location. This does not boot the other dudes.

name: Chinese Day Laborers
effect: This action is free for the Maze Rats. Reaction: Play immediately before you put a deed into play. That deed has its cost reduced by two.

name: Church Raisin'
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your dudes and move him to the Town Square. If the job is successful and the total Influence of the dudes in your posse is greater than half the current Fear Level, then the Fear Level is reduced by one.

name: Coleman is Killed!
effect: All Wanted dudes in play become unwanted. J.P.Coleman is aced, if he is in play.

name: Crippled
effect: Reaction: Play immediately before a dude is going to be aced during a Shootout. Instead of being aced, that dude is sent home, but is crippled permanently. The crippled dude loses 1 Bullet, 1 Influence, and can only move to adjacent locations.

name: Election Day
effect: All Dudes in play are up for the office of Mayor. Each player, as a Noon action, may boot a Dude to give any candidate votes equal to the dude`s Influence, or else pay three ghost rock to buy one vote for any dude. If at nightfall any Dude has more votes than everyone else, he or she gains one Influence and becomes worth an extra Control Point, until the next Election Day. Ace this card.

name: Finnegan O`Malley
effect: If a posse with O`Malley wins a round of a Shootout, the opposing posse must ace one additional dude.

name: Green-Eye Saloon
effect: Public. Non-Unique.

name: Gyonshee
effect: Abomination. Cannot move to a location that does not have a Maze Rat.

name: Hank Gallagher
effect: Non-Unique.

name: Harlot's Haven Strike
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Howlin' Hollow
effect: Private. Strike. Haunted. Controller Noon: Boot to give a Harrowed dude +1 Bullet bonus for this turn.

name: Hunch
effect: Noon Hex X: Boot this Huckster. The difficulty of this Hex is double the number of cards you want to look at. If this Hex is successful, look at the top X cards of any player's deck. You may put one of those cards on the bottom of the deck or the top of the discard pile.

name: Ike's Strike
effect: Private. Non-Unique. Strike.

name: Jebediah Whateley
effect: Huckster:1

name: Kidnapping
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your dudes to kidnap any dude in play with a lower Bullet Rating that is controlled by another player. If the job is successful the kidnapped dude is discarded, and all of the dudes in your posse become wanted.

name: Library
effect: Public. All Hucksters in the controller's gang have +1 Bullet bonus and +1 Influence.

name: Little Mountain
effect: Shaman:1

name: Long Arm of the Law
effect: Boot all Wanted dudes in play.

name: Luck of the Draw
effect: Reaction: Play immediately before Draw Hands are revealed to increase or decrease your hand rank by one (and your hand is now considered the worst possible hand of that rank).

name: Maze Dragon
effect: Abomination. May not have goods. The Maze Dragon cannot move to or join posses at locations in town.

name: Maze Runner
effect: All strikes are considered adjacent for this dude. Noon: Boot the Maze Runner to move this dude and up to four of your other dudes from one strike to another.

name: Mitobu
effect: Shootout: Ace any Abomination in the opposing posse. Mitobu cannot be your shooter and provides no extra cards in this shootout. You cannot perform this action if Mitobu is the only dude in your posse.

name: Mortimer Jones
effect: It costs 3 less ghost rock to bring Jones into play if you control the Rail Station. Reaction: Boot Jones to reduce by 2 ghost rock the cost of a dude or goods you are about to bring into play.

name: Mustang
effect: Horse. Reaction: Boot the Mustang instead of this dude when joining a posse. A booted dude cannot join in this fashion.

name: Nelson Roberts
effect: Roberts can attach any card with "Rifle" in the title at no cost.

name: Night Haunt
effect: Reaction Pull: Play immediately before the end of nightfall when a dude is at a strike or other out-of-town location. If the pull is greater than the dude's value, he is aced. This action cannot target a Terror, Reverend, or member of The Flock.

name: No Funny Stuff
effect: Shootout: No Reactions can be played until after this Shootout is over. No more Shootout actions can be played for this Shootout.

name: Phantom Fingers
effect: Noon Hex 7: If this Hex is successful, take any one goods on a Dude in an adjacent location and give it to this Huckster if she can hold it. Shootout Hex 8: If this Hex is successful, take any one weapon attached to an opposing Dude and give it to this Huckster if she can hold it.

name: Po Yu
effect: Huckster:2

name: Rain Dance
effect: Reaction Spirit 5: Boot this shaman during upkeep. If the Spirit is successful, your Outfit`s ghost rock production is increased by three for this turn.

name: Red Spade
effect: Reaction: Play immediately after a pull is revealed to change the suit or color of the pull to the suit or color of your choice.

name: Richard Boothe
effect: While Boothe is at another player's strike, it produces no ghost rock.

name: Sacred Tomahawk
effect: Mystical. Weapon. May only be attached to a Sioux. Shootout: Ace the Tomahawk to ace any opposing Harrowed Dude.

name: Smiling Lizard Lode
effect: Private. Strike. Any dude that is not a Terror is at a -1 Bullet penalty while in a Shootout at this location.

name: Speed of the Wolf
effect: Noon Spirit 5: If this Spirit is successful, move one of your unbooted dudes to any location in play. Reaction Spirit 7: If this Spirit is successful when a posse is being formed, then one of your unbooted dudes joins the posse, regardless of location.

name: Stampede
effect: Every dude in the Town Square is moved home, booted. No dudes can move to the Town Square this turn.

name: Sun Shu-Jen
effect: May not have any weapons. Shootout: Shu-Jen gains a +2 Bullet bonus if there are no weapons in the opposing posse. Shootout: Send home all dudes in the opposing posse with a value lower than Shu-Jen`s Bullet Rating.

name: Tattoo
effect: Noon: Boot one of your Sioux dudes. This dude takes a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum zero), permanently. This dude has his Shaman skill increased by one, permanently. No dude may be tattooed more than once during a game. This does not give the Shaman skill to a dude that does not have it.

name: The Fear
effect: Noon: If the Fear Level is 5 or greater, boot all non-Terror dudes with a Bullet Rating less than 2.

name: The Lucky Dog Lode
effect: Private. Strike.

name: The Maze Rats
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:16 Your dudes may consider all strikes to be adjacent to your home. Noon: Boot one or more of your dudes at a strike you control. If the combined Bullet Rating of the dudes is higher than the production of the strike, you are considered the owner of the deed until the end of the game.

name: Wall Crawler
effect: Abomination. The Wall Crawler cannot move to or join posses at locations in town. The Wall Crawler cannot have goods. There is no limit to the number of Wall Crawlers that each player can have in play. Card Memory does not apply to Wall Crawlers

name: Xiong "Wendy" Cheng
effect: Shootout: Send one dude in the opposing posse home, booted. Wendy loses 2 bullets (minimum zero) and becomes a Draw until nightfall.
